title: African Lion Roar Close-up Painting Wild Animal Wall Decor Art Print Poster (16x20)
description: “Let you faith Roar so loud that you can’t hear what Doubt is saying” Amplify the look of your dull living room space by hanging this beautiful lion roar poster. African lion king is an ideal jumping off point for turning a child’s bedroom into a wonder of animal and jungle décor. It will go great with the jungle safari décor. The lion is a species in the Felidae family and a member of the genus panther. Hurry up and grab this wonderful African lion poster for its durable quality and high degree of color accuracy.
